name: colorizer
description: Returns color codes in requested order
author: John Doe

scripts.start: node -r esm ./src/index.js parallel true false true true '["green","blue", "red", "red"]'
scripts.start-seq: node -r esm ./src/index.js sequential true false true true '["green","blue", "red", "red"]'
scripts.dev: nodemon -r esm ./src/index.js parallel true false true true '["green","blue", "red", "red"]'
